title: City Shoes pairing of balanced and leaped

content.question: In the final sentence of the passage, the pairing of the verbs “balanced” and “leaped” suggest what fine distinction regarding the character of Altaf?

choices.label: He is finally secure in his decision to return home.
He looks forward to a happy reunion with his neglected family.
He relishes his celebrity with the children and mimics their play.
He is poised between two worlds but eager to be home.

content.answer: He is poised between two worlds but eager to be home.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
